title: "Summary Tables"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment=NA, prompt=FALSE, cache=FALSE, echo=TRUE, results='asis')

```


```{r loadLibraries, echo = F}
library(summarytools)
library(knitr)
library(summarytools)
#library(tidyverse)

st_options(bootstrap.css     = FALSE,       # Already part of the theme so no need for it
           plain.ascii       = FALSE,       # One of the essential settings
           style             = "rmarkdown", # Idem.
           dfSummary.silent  = TRUE,        # Suppresses messages about temporary files
           footnote          = NA,          # Keeping the results minimalistic
           subtitle.emphasis = FALSE)       # For the vignette theme, this gives
                                            # much better results. Your mileage may vary

```

```{r load_objects = "asis"}
io <- readRDS("results/multi_city/io.rds")
# Assumes that multi_city_script.R has been run till 
cities <- c('accra','sao_paulo','delhi','bangalore')

```

```{r trip_tables = "asis"}

for(city in cities){
    td <- io[[city]]$dist
    print(kable(td, caption = paste("Distance table for ", city)))
    cat("\n")
}


for(city in cities){
    td <- io[[city]]$dur
    print(kable(td, caption = paste("Duration table for ", city)))
    cat("\n")
}

```



```{r pa = "asis"}

for (city in cities){
  td <- io[[city]]$outcomes$mmets
  print(dfSummary(td))
  cat("\n")

}

```
